games.title: Mahjong Magic Islands
games.description: Join the enchanting adventure of Mahjong Magic Islands, a free online game that combines mahjong solitaire with exploration. Restore the islands'' magic by matching tiles and earning rewards while helping mythical beings revive their land. Enjoy this intriguing puzzle on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Mahjong with history. Puzzle and adventure. Play and win! Connect tiles and collect prizes.

The wonderful world of the Magic Islands is in desparate need of magic to help restore the waning natural beauty of their ancient cities with a new wild energy. Tons of mythical creatures await your help throughout these scattered island. You are their only hope to be saved, fix these wonderful magic lands back to their former beauty!

Mahjong Magic Islands features classic mahjong solitaire in a uniquely original visual format. Collecting components for magic spells adds a fun layer to the gameplay, and meeting cute magical creatures to help out gives the varied levels of the game more significant depth.

* The mysterious worlds of the Magic Islands await discovery.
* Journey through the Mahjong Magic Islands solving fun brain teasers.
* Meet mysterious and mythical creatures, and help them on their way!
* Hunt down magic ingredients and make magic spells.
* Search and connect tiles.
* Mahjong Solitaire

You have to complete levels with classic mahjong solitaire mechanics. All the action takes place in a fairy-tale world inhabited by magical creatures who need your help!

games.title: Alpha Balls
games.description: Alpha Balls is a stimulating word puzzle game that sharpens your mind and vocabulary. Enjoy it online for free on any device. Solve puzzles to earn coins for hints, making it an entertaining and educational challenge for all.
games.howToPlayText: Make words from letters. The hint can show you the first letters of an answer. If you press the bin, the additional letters that mislead you will be removed. Press the ball with a tick to confirm your answer and earn coins. You can spend coins for hints.

games.title: Onet Animals
games.description: Onet Animals is a charming puzzle game that involves matching similar animal tiles. Completing pairs allows you to finish levels. With its engaging challenge and adorable visuals, this game is fun for players of every age.
games.howToPlayText: Onet Animals is a charming puzzle game that involves matching similar animal tiles. Completing pairs allows you to finish levels. With its engaging challenge and adorable visuals, this game is fun for players of every age.

games.title: Master of 3 Tiles
games.description: Master of 3 Tiles is a thrilling online puzzle game. Match identical tiles in sets of three to clear the board. Each level increases in difficulty, enhancing your strategic skills. No downloads or registration needed, it’s accessible on desktop and mobile for short or long gaming sessions.
games.howToPlayText: Master of 3 Tiles is a thrilling online puzzle game. Match identical tiles in sets of three to clear the board.
